modName: Aegis - The Keep Hidden in the Mountain
summary: Aegis is a Ancient Dwmer Classle Hidden in the Mountainside somewere in Skyrim. Will you be the one to uncover its secrets? And find its possible inhabitants?  A secret Dwarven Technogly lies on the coastline, can you harness its power ?
descriptionHtml:
Currently a Work in Progress. This is my MAIN project that i will be putting all my skills into creating

Features : 
In V 1.0
Bedroom (Enchanting Table , Alch Table , Library , Vault)
Work Room ( Furnace , Anvil , Workbench)
Main Hall (Kitchen , Feast hall

In Later Versions
Sub Coordination Room (Followers + Transport)
Dwarven Tatical Silo (Big Explosions)
Training Room ( Spawnable Enemies)
author: Spikes210 AKA Remnant
